subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo, who helped lead Real Madrid to the Champions League title, had to be nudged into leaving the insulation of Madeira for a better opportunity.
snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo, who helped lead Real Madrid to the Champions League title, had to be nudged into leaving the insulation of Madeira for a better opportunity.
